name: Product Knowledge Base Chat
description: A customer-facing chat interface for product support. Customers can select a product and ask technical questions, with AI-powered answers based on your uploaded documentation.

configurationSchema.label: Page Name
configurationSchema.description: The name displayed in the browser tab

configurationSchema.label: Welcome Title
configurationSchema.description: The main heading shown to customers
configurationSchema.default: How can we help you today?

configurationSchema.label: Welcome Subtitle
configurationSchema.description: Supporting text shown below the title
configurationSchema.default: Select a product and ask any question about features, setup, or troubleshooting.
configurationSchema.placeholder: e.g., Ask us anything about our products

configurationSchema.label: Primary Color
configurationSchema.description: The main accent color for buttons and highlights

configurationSchema.label: Secondary Color
configurationSchema.description: A lighter variant for hover states

configurationSchema.label: Default Color Theme
configurationSchema.description: The default theme when users first visit

configurationSchema.label: AI Model
configurationSchema.description: The AI model to use for answering questions

configurationSchema.label: System Prompt
configurationSchema.default: You are a helpful product support assistant. Answer questions based on the provided documentation. Be concise, accurate, and friendly. If you don't know the answer or the documentation doesn't cover the topic, say so honestly and suggest the customer contact support directly.
configurationSchema.placeholder: Enter custom instructions for the AI...

configurationSchema.label: Show Sources
configurationSchema.description: Display source documents used to generate answers

configurationSchema.label: Suggested Questions
configurationSchema.description: Example questions to show customers (one per line)
configurationSchema.default:
How do I get started?
What are the main features?
How do I troubleshoot common issues?
configurationSchema.placeholder:
How do I get started?
What features are available?
